summary: A test suite that validates point‑selection utilities in the imod package, checking index calculation, value retrieval and assignment for both regular (equidistant) and irregular (nonequidistant, unstructured) grids across different data structures such as DataArray and UDA.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate spatial querying and manipulation of model data, supporting diverse grid configurations to enable reliable downstream analysis and decision‑making in geoscientific workflows.
